price: 19.Kaadu Yallal makaxxa-mariinitina, diggaluk anu baxxaqqa-le sumaq siinih baaheyyo kay farmoyta kinniyoomuh.
arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-an lā taʿlū ʿalā al-lahi innī ātīkum bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
